security-notice.summary: libvirtd crashes in virConnectGetAllDomainStats with empty cdrom
security-notice.description: When calling the virConnectGetAllDomainStats API on a guest which has a CDROM drive with no media present, libvirtd will crash on a NULL pointer acess
security-notice.impact: An application can cause a denial of service by crashing libvirtd if a guest has a CDROM drive with no media
security-notice.workaround: Avoid calling the virConnectGetAllDomainStats API, or ensure all CDROM drives have media inserted
